timeline.bodyText: Are any of these types shareable between the charting parsers? Is there a common data model that the back end is using?
timeline.author: njbriggs

replies.bodyText: yes, the metrics data is common. I will refactor this into a common place, but limiting the conflict for now until the previous PRs are merged
replies.author: elfenheart

timeline.bodyText: Small optimization: d3.max takes an accessor. So that portion could be d3.max(data, (d) => d.eventsPerMin)
timeline.author: njbriggs
